          <title>
            <string language="es">El aparato digestivo en rumiantes</string>
            <string language="en">The digestive system in ruminants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verdauungssystem in den Wiederkäuern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système digestif chez les ruminants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema digestivo nos ruminantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema digestivo in ruminanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χωνευτικό σύστημα στα μηρυκαστικά</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir cómo es el aparato digestivo de los rumiantes.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover what the digestive system of ruminants is like.</string>
          </description>

Kursteilnehmer, was das Verdauungssystem der Wiederkäuer wie ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir comme ce qu'est le système digestif des ruminants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir o 
que o sistema digestivo dos ruminantes é como.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire che cosa

          </description>

τι το χωνευτικό σύστημα των μηρυκαστικών είναι όπως.</string>
          </description>
